price: Sa shumë qytete kemi rrënuar Ne! Dënimi Ynë u erdhi natën ose ditën kur ata pushonin.
arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ هُمۡ قَآئِلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wakam min qaryatin ahlaknāhā fajāahā basunā bayātan aw hum qāilūna
